properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 18 at 6:15PM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog.

* WHERE...Mobile Central and Mobile Coastal Counties.

* WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light southeasterly flow just out in
advance of an approaching cold front is advecting warm and moist
air over the much cooler waters of Mobile Bay and Mississippi
Sound, and as a result areas of fog, dense in some locations,
has developed. This will likely persist through this evening,
but by midnight the front will be moving through the area and a
drier more west to northwesterly wind flow will develop and the
fog should begin to dissipate.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
